{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.5M in 2020-2021** on contracts with 2536 4589 QUEBEC.

Across 1 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 1 have at least one amendment (100%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 206% and the average number of amendments was 4. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$7.0M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 5.02 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$10.4M. The longest contract was 5.02 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$10.4M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [2536-4589 QUÉBEC INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%222536-4589%20QU%c3%89BEC%20INC.%22)
{{< /details >}}
